item.title: Another day...
item.description: ...another Peloton challenge failed, another meditation streak lost. home-made bread, the cause BEGIN AGAIN ...and a Taylor Swift's Folklore is coming out tonight...

item.title: Peloton Challenge
item.description: Moving to the States is exciting for several reasons: Christmases are going to be snowy, and Thanksgiving dinners will have turkey again. But most importantly the amazing world of online shopping will be at our feet and God Iâ€™m looking forward to it. With the COVID situation and the unsafeness associated with close contact activities, we decided the first purchase to be a peloton bike. But in order to make things a little bit more fun, we decided to add a small challenge.
